messages.text: Hey, are you free to talk about the project?
Yeah, sure! Let’s go over it now.
You never listen when I try to explain things.
That’s not true, you just don’t make any sense sometimes.
I’m feeling a bit anxious about the presentation tomorrow.
Don’t worry, you’ve prepared really well. I’ll help you practice if you want.
Why did you ignore my message all day?
I had work, stop overreacting.
I think we should split the tasks evenly next time.
That’s fair. I can take the research part if you handle the writing.
You’re always late, it’s so annoying.
Whatever, it’s not like you’re perfect either.
Can we talk about what happened yesterday? I didn’t mean to upset you.
Yeah, I appreciate that. Let’s clear the air.
Stop interrupting me!
If you’d actually say something useful, I wouldn’t need to.
I didn’t understand your point in the meeting earlier.
Oh, sorry! I can explain it again if you want.
You forgot to send the file again.
Maybe if you reminded me properly, I wouldn’t have.
Hey, how’s your week going so far?
Pretty good! Been catching up on some work. You?
Same here. Deadlines everywhere, but I’m surviving.
Haha, we’re all in the same boat. Need a break soon.
Absolutely. Coffee tomorrow?
Why didn’t you reply to my message yesterday?
I was busy. Do I have to report every minute to you?
No, but it feels like you just ignore me when it’s not convenient.
That’s not fair. You’re overreacting again.
You always say that instead of listening.
I think the presentation could use a stronger conclusion.
Yeah, that makes sense. Maybe we can summarize the main findings again at the end.
Good idea. I can write a draft and you can review it?
Perfect. Let’s finalize it before Thursday.
You didn’t update the slides again, did you?
I had too many things going on. It’s not like you’re helping much either.
Excuse me? I’ve been fixing all your mistakes since day one.
Wow, okay. Guess you’re perfect then.
Forget it. I’ll just do everything myself.
I didn’t do great in that interview. I just froze halfway.
That happens to everyone sometimes. You’ll do better next time.
Yeah, I guess. I just feel like I blew my chance.
Not at all. You gained experience. Want to practice together before the next one?
We keep having the same argument about chores.
Because you keep bringing it up!
Because nothing changes! I end up doing everything.
Maybe if you weren’t so controlling, I’d help more.
You just proved my point.
Hey, I noticed you seemed quiet today. Everything okay?
Yeah, just tired. Didn’t sleep much last night.
Want to talk about what’s on your mind?
Not really, but thanks for asking. I just need some rest.
Got it. Take care of yourself, okay?
You didn’t tell me you were meeting them today.
I didn’t think I had to inform you of every little thing.
It’s not about that. I just wanted to be included.
You’re too sensitive sometimes. It wasn’t a big deal.
Maybe not to you, but it was to me.
I think our communication has gotten better lately.
Yeah, I’ve noticed that too. We’re both listening more.
I’m glad. It makes collaboration smoother.
Definitely. Let’s keep that energy going.
Can we please focus on the problem instead of blaming each other?
Fine. But you did mess up the data entry last time.
True, but bringing that up now doesn’t help us fix this.
You’re right. Let’s check the logs and fix it together.
Thanks. That’s all I wanted.
